description:
Lucky is the main protagonist on the television series Alola Detective Lucky (アローラ探偵ラキ) which airs on Alola TV in the Alola region. Alola Detective Lucky`s deductions never miss their mark as his deductions are logical and the way he confronts the culprit is daring. His case solve rate is 100 percent.
Professor Kukui bought the Lucky Roleplay Set for Rotom Pokédex as they were both fans of the show and watch it all the time. The set came with a seven-piece set of detective tools, so it was a really good buy.
name: Alola Tantei Lucky
